name: getGifsById
description: A multiget version of the get GIF by ID endpoint.

ids.description: Filters results by specified GIF IDs, separated by commas.

$ul: **meta**: The Meta Object contains basic information regarding the request, whether it was successful, and the response given by the API.  Check `responses` to see a description of types of response codes the API might give you under different cirumstances.
**response_id**: A unique ID paired with this response from the API.
**pagination**: The Pagination Object contains information relating to the number of total results available as well as the number of results fetched and their relative positions.
